episodes.title: Uncharted
episodes.description: When the Ninja learn that Master Wu, Misako, and Clutch powers have gone missing on an expedition to an uncharted island, they launch a rescue mission. Recruiting Twitchy Tim, the only person to ever return from this mysterious island, the ninja must brave the dangerous storm belt to reach its shore.

episodes.title: The Keepers of the Amulet
episodes.description: While searching the island, the ninja realize they're being followed and brace for an attack. Fortunately, it turns out to be a friendly dragon they name Zippy. However, just as they pickup trail of their missing friends, they're attacked by power-absorbing stone statues! Lloyd manages to escape, but the other ninja are captured by a group of islanders called The Keepers of the Amulet.

episodes.title: The Gift of Jay
episodes.description: The Leader of the Keepers order Nya, Kai, Zane, and Cole into a prison where they're reunited with Master Wu, Miskao, and Clutch Powers. However, Jay is brought to a luxurious hut and fed amazing food while the Keepers refer to him as the "Gift of Jay". Lloyd mounts a rescue mission to save his friends and they realize that Jay may be in the most danger of all.

episodes.title: The Tooth of Wojira
episodes.description: Breaking free of their bonds, the ninja attempt to rescue Jay but are too late as he's taken by the sea serpent. When Lloyd makes an interesting discovery, they realize that the Keepers may have been manipulated. Jay finds himself in a cavern full of hoarded treasure where the real villain is revealed. Heroically, the ninja, and Twitchy Tim, come to Jay's rescue.

episodes.title: A Big Splash
episodes.description: The ninja ambush a new villain named Miss Demeanor who's carrying a shipment of illegal vengestone. Nya creates a water cyclone to stop her but loses control of it, threatening a nearby village. The ninja save the residents but Miss Demeanor escapes. At the monastery, Nya's powers continue to go haywire. Against her wishes, Kai calls in the help of their mother, Maya.

episodes.title: The Call of the Deep
episodes.description: Maya attempts to take charge of Nya's life to solve her "little problem" with discipline, healthy eating, and more training - all things that quickly irk Nya. Zane and Pixal respond to a distress call at sea but a strange energy pulse almost destroys their vehicles. They trace the source of the blast to deep under the ocean and surmise it may be responsible for the problems with Nya's power.

episodes.title: Unsinkable
episodes.description: Nya, Jay, Zane, Pixal and Lloyd board a new submarine, the Hydro Bounty, and set off to find the source of the energy signal disrupting Nya’s powers. When chores are mysteriously completed, the ninja discover they have a stowaway - Maya. As they near the Tartarus Trench, the source of the energy pulse, the sub is attacked and sinks to the bottom of the ocean, powerless and trapped.

episodes.title: Five Thousand Fathoms Down
episodes.description: Realizing that the power source may be their only way to get the Hydro Bounty running, Nya and Maya use the underwater APS suits to travel to the energy source. Reaching an ancient temple, they discover a new villain, Prince Kalmaar, attempting to awaken an ancient evil. He discovers Maya and Nya, zapping them before they can escape.

episodes.title: The Wrath of Kalmaar
episodes.description: Nya and Maya are held captive by Kalmaar who wants the location of the Storm Amulet. However he is summoned by his father, King Trimaar, who has learned he may be responsible for sinking the Hydro Bounty. Nya and Maya manage to free themselves and escape but are pursued by deadly Ripper Sharks. Meanwhile Jay risks his life in an attempt to restore power to the Hydro Bounty.

episodes.title: Long Live the King
episodes.description: After the Bounty rescues Nya and Maya, they're all escorted to Merlopia to face King Trimaar. However Kalmaar betrays his own people and turns the ninja into fugitives who must now escape the flooding palace. Benthomaar learns the truth about his brother’s intentions, and realizes the ninja aren’t to blame.

episodes.title: Escape from Merlopia
episodes.description: Using their scuba-respirators, the ninja survive the palace flooding but are pursued by Ripper Sharks. Benthomaar comes to their aid and leads them to the hangar bay. As a battle breaks out, the ninja launch the Hydro Bounty. A chase through Merlopia ensues as Kalmaar and his forces try to shoot down the Bounty. The ninja narrowly escape, now with Benthomaar as their new ally.

episodes.title: The Tale of Benthomaar
episodes.description: A flashback tells the tragic tale of Benthomaar. King Trimaar finds Benthomaar as a baby and adopts him as his own. As Bentho grows older he tries hard to earn his brother’s affection but Kalmaar has no interest as he's obsessed with finding Wojira. Kalmaar eventually betrays Benthomaar's trust by tricking him into swimming through dangerous sulphur vents to find Wojira's Temple.

episodes.title: The Storm Amulet
episodes.description: The ninja return to the Island of the Keepers to warn them of Kalmaar's plan. They convince the Leader to allow them to take the Storm Amulet to Ninjago City for safe keeping but discover the amulet is a fake! Surmising that Clutch Powers is behind this, the ninja rush to the sub only to be ambushed by Kalmaar. He learns the real location of the amulet and destroys the sub, standing them.

episodes.title: Riddle of the Sphinx
episodes.description: Kai, Ray, Cole, Wu, and Misako receive Nya's warning and rush to the Explorer's Club to retrieve the amulet. They successfully answer a riddle to gain access just as Kamlaar and his forces arrive to battle for the amulet. Meanwhile at the island, Benthomaar encourages Nya to try using her power in a surprising new way, giving them a chance to return to Ninjago City.

episodes.title: Papergirl
episodes.description: Antonia, head papergirl, decides to call it quits just as she and Nelson cross paths with the ninja and Prince Kalmaar. The Storm Amulet rolls from the fight right to Antonia's feet. She peddles off through the city in a hopes of keeping it out of the villain's hands. Kalmaar catches her and the amulet, but Antonia is able to rescue Kai. She proves to herself that everyone can make a difference.

episodes.title: Master of the Sea
episodes.description: Benthomaar tells Nya the tale of Nyad and how she defeated Wojira. At the same time, back in Ninjago City, Master Wu, Kai, Cole, Ray, and Misako attempt to keep Kalmaar from making off with the Storm Amulet. Nya and the others arrive just in time to turn the tide of the battle. They drive away Kalmaar and his forces to secure the Storm Amulet. Or did they?

episodes.title: The Calm Before the Storm
episodes.description: The doomsday serpent Wojira emerges from the sea, ridden by Kalmaar himself, nearly capsizing a small fishing trawler in the process. In Ninjago City, Glutinous emerges from the water with a dire warning for the ninja. He reveals that Kalmaar has awakened Wojira and they're on their way here! As the citizens of Ninjago scramble to leave the city, Wojira and Kalmaar arrive!

episodes.title: Assault on Ninjago City
episodes.description: Kalmaar and Wojira arrive in Ninjago City bringing forth a tsunami that floods the city. The ninja leap into action, rescuing anyone unlucky enough to be left behind and trapped. Even Dareth springs forward as the Brown Ninja to help. Wojira attacks the Bounty, crashing it into the water.  Jay's sub car is damaged and he sinks to the bottom, powerless. Nya joins the battle to face Kalmaar head on.

episodes.title: Nyad
episodes.description: Overpowered by Wojira, the ninja retreat to the NGTV building to regroup. After being rescued from underwater by Benthomaar, Jay is in bad shape having swallowed too much water. Nya is unable to draw it out and contemplates a decision to save Jay that she may never be able to come back from.

episodes.title: The Turn of the Tide
episodes.description: Kalmaar and Wojira battle Nya while Benthomaar and the other ninja do their best to help. Kalmaar's temper finally rankles Wojira who turns on him and devours him whole. Just as she turns on the ninja, Nya fulfills her destiny and pries the amulet from Wojira's head, defeating her. However it's too late for Nya, who says goodbye and dives into the ocean.
